title: QIAGEN Earns ACT Label and My Green Lab Platinum Certification, Demonstrating Commitment to Eco-Friendly Practices and Sustainability
text: QIAGEN Earns ACT Label and My Green Lab Platinum Certification, Demonstrating Commitment to Eco-Friendly Practices and Sustainability Published / Modified Feb 15 2024 CSIMarket Team / CSIMarket.com In a remarkable achievement for the global biotechnology company QIAGEN, their new eco-friendlier QIAwave products have earned the prestigious ACT Label, while their Sample technologies R&D lab in Germany has achieved the sought-after My Green Lab Platinum certification. These accomplishments mark significant milestones in QIAGEN's ongoing commitment to reducing their environmental impact and improving their overall sustainability practices. Additionally, a strong dedication to minimizing plastic packaging and greenhouse gas emissions further highlights QIAGEN's comprehensive Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) strategy, aimed at making a positive impact on society. QIAGEN, a leading provider of innovative sample and assay technologies, has recently been recognized for its groundbreaking efforts towards sustainable practices. Their newly launched QIAwave kits for DNA and RNA extraction have received the highly regarded ACT Label due to their significantly improved Environmental Impact Factor compared to standard kits in the market. This recognition underlines QIAGEN's determination to develop and offer eco-friendly solutions to their customers, enabling them to carry out their research while minimizing their carbon footprint. Furthermore, QIAGEN's Sample technologies R&D lab in Germany has achieved the prestigious My Green Lab Platinum certification, a highly regarded acknowledgment in the industry. This certification serves as a testament to the lab's dedication and adherence to sustainable laboratory practices, highlighting their commitment to reducing water consumption, energy usage, and waste generation. The lab's accomplishment sets a high standard, inspiring and paving the way for other QIAGEN sites to pursue similar certifications and contribute to the company's overarching sustainability goals. QIAGEN's commitment to reducing plastic packaging and greenhouse gas emissions is a significant part of their comprehensive ESG strategy. As more focus is placed on sustainability in all aspects of their operations, the company aims to decrease the environmental impact of their product packaging and improve their carbon footprint. By proactively implementing environmentally conscious practices throughout the supply chain,QIAGEN seeks to support a greener future and exemplify their dedication to ensuring a positive impact on the environment and society. Despite challenges faced, QIAGEN's commitment to sustainability remains unwavering. The company's revenue for the corresponding period experienced a decline of -30.29% year on year, reflecting the difficult economic climate. However, QIAGEN remains dedicated to providing excellent service to their corporate clients, demonstrating resilience and adaptability in turbulent times. Conclusion: QIAGEN's recent achievements, including earning the ACT Label for their new QIAwave products and achieving My Green Lab Platinum certification at their German R&D lab, highlight the company's unwavering dedication to sustainable practices. Through these accomplishments, QIAGEN exemplifies their commitment to reducing their environmental impact and improving their overall sustainability performance. With a focus on plastic packaging reduction, greenhouse gas emission reduction, and comprehensive ESG strategies, QIAGEN is setting a benchmark for sustainability excellence in the biotechnology industry.
